detailsData.title: Expert Legal Counsel
detailsData.content: Tuple Legal’s founder, Ryan Hughes, is a nonprofit law attorney with deep roots in California politics and nonprofits. He provides the counsel you need to be laser-focused on your mission.

detailsData.title: Comprehensive Services
detailsData.content: Tuple helps California nonprofits with their ongoing needs such as Form 990, periodic state filings, bylaws amendments, and conflict of interest issues. They facilitate annual meetings and ensure compliance.

detailsData.title: Political Activities Guidance
detailsData.content: Tuple offers comprehensive legal counsel to help your group positively influence the political process. They help navigate the complex rules around permissible political activities for nonprofits.

detailsData.title: Featured Clients
detailsData.content: Tuple Legal has been featured in major news outlets for their work with clients. They have helped clients achieve significant victories, such as forcing Bernie Sanders to withdraw an endorsement.

address: 3717 E. Thousand Oaks Blvd. Westlake Village, CA 91362
subHeading: Nonprofit Law and Major Donor Compliance
valueProp: Tuple Legal’s founder, Ryan Hughes, is a nonprofit law attorney. Ryan has deep roots in California politics and nonprofits, so he’s more than a lawyer: he’s the counsel you need to be laser-focused on you and your mission, every step of the way.

testimonalData.text: Tuple Legal provided exceptional guidance for our nonprofit's formation. We couldn't have done it without them.
testimonalData.author: Jane Doe

testimonalData.text: Ryan Hughes is incredibly knowledgeable about nonprofit law. His advice has been invaluable to our organization.
testimonalData.author: John Smith

testimonalData.text: Thanks to Tuple Legal, we navigated the complexities of Form 990 with ease. Highly recommend their services.
testimonalData.author: Emily Johnson
